import externalGlobals from "rollup-plugin-external-globals"

  build: {
    rollupOptions: {
      external: ["vue", "vuex", "axios", "vue-router"],

        externalGlobals({
          vue: "Vue",
          vuex: "Vuex",
          axios: "axios",
          "vue-router": "VueRouter",
        }),
      ],
    },
  },
})
